billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Relates to leased vehicle protections
summary: Relates to leased vehicle protections; provides that every lease shall itemize and set forth in detail all costs required to be paid by the lessee or purchaser of the rental vehicle upon termination of such lease.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3090

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. PRETLOW, P. RIVERA, V. LOPEZ, COOK -- read once
         and referred to the Committee on Consumer Affairs and Protection

       AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to  lease  vehicle
         protections

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 396-z of the general business  law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 16 to read as follows:
    3    16.  EVERY  LEASE  SHALL  ITEMIZE  AND  SET  FORTH IN DETAIL ALL COSTS
    4  REQUIRED TO BE PAID BY THE LESSEE OR PURCHASER  OF  THE  RENTAL  VEHICLE
    5  UPON TERMINATION OF SUCH LEASE.
    6    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
    7  have become a law; provided, however, that  subdivision  16  of  section
    8  396-z  of the general business law, as added by section one of this act,
    9  shall survive the expiration and reversion of such section  as  provided
   10  in section 4 of chapter 656 of the laws of 2002, as amended.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02993-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to lease vehicle protections
